product_vision: Create a smart home energy dashboard that helps users monitor, optimize, and reduce their electricity usage across multiple devices and rooms.

epics.title: Energy Monitoring and Data Collection
epics.description: Develop a system to collect real-time energy usage data from all connected devices and rooms in the home. This includes integrating with smart meters, plugs, and other IoT devices to provide a comprehensive view of electricity consumption.

features.title: Device Integration for Energy Data Collection
features.description: Enable the system to connect and collect real-time energy usage data from various IoT devices such as smart plugs, smart meters, and other connected appliances. This feature ensures seamless integration with a wide range of devices through standard protocols.

features.title: Room-Level Energy Monitoring
features.description: Provide users with the ability to monitor energy consumption at a room-by-room level by grouping devices based on their location in the home. This allows for detailed insights into energy usage patterns across different spaces.

features.title: Real-Time Data Visualization Dashboard
features.description: Create a user-friendly dashboard that displays real-time energy usage data for the entire home, individual rooms, and specific devices. This feature helps users instantly understand their consumption through graphs and metrics.

features.title: Historical Energy Usage Reports
features.description: Allow users to access and analyze historical energy consumption data over customizable time periods (daily, weekly, monthly). This feature supports trend analysis and helps identify opportunities for energy savings.

features.title: Alerts for Unusual Energy Consumption
features.description: Implement a notification system that alerts users when energy usage exceeds predefined thresholds or shows unusual spikes. This helps users detect potential issues like malfunctioning devices or forgotten appliances.

epics.title: User Interface and Visualization
epics.description: Create an intuitive dashboard interface that displays energy usage data through charts, graphs, and breakdowns by device or room. The UI should be accessible via web and mobile apps for easy monitoring.

features.title: Dashboard Layout and Navigation
features.description: Design a responsive dashboard layout that adapts to web and mobile interfaces, providing users with an intuitive navigation system to access energy usage data. This includes a customizable home screen with quick access to key metrics and sections for detailed views.

features.title: Energy Usage Charts and Graphs
features.description: Implement interactive charts and graphs to visually represent energy consumption trends over time, such as daily, weekly, or monthly usage. Users should be able to zoom in on specific time periods and toggle between different chart types like line or bar graphs.

features.title: Device-Level Energy Breakdown
features.description: Provide a detailed breakdown of energy usage by individual devices, allowing users to identify high-consumption appliances. This feature includes sortable lists and visual indicators to highlight devices consuming the most energy.

features.title: Room-Based Energy Analysis
features.description: Enable users to view energy consumption categorized by room or area in their home, with aggregated data for all devices in each space. This feature supports a visual map or list view for easy comparison across different areas.

features.title: Real-Time Data Updates
features.description: Integrate real-time data syncing to ensure the dashboard reflects the most current energy usage information. Users will receive live updates or notifications for significant changes in consumption patterns.

features.title: Accessibility and Multi-Platform Support
features.description: Ensure the UI adheres to accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG) for users with disabilities and provides seamless functionality across web and mobile platforms. This includes voice command support and adjustable text sizes for better readability.

epics.title: Energy Optimization and Recommendations
epics.description: Implement algorithms to analyze usage patterns and provide personalized recommendations for reducing energy consumption. This includes suggesting optimal device schedules and identifying high-usage areas for improvement.

features.title: Energy Usage Pattern Analysis
features.description: Develop an algorithm to analyze historical energy consumption data and identify patterns in usage across different times, days, and devices. This feature will provide the foundation for understanding user behavior and energy waste.

features.title: Personalized Energy Saving Recommendations
features.description: Provide users with tailored suggestions for reducing energy consumption based on their usage patterns, such as turning off unused devices or adjusting settings for efficiency. Recommendations will be delivered through notifications or a dedicated dashboard.

features.title: Optimal Device Scheduling
features.description: Enable the system to suggest and automate optimal schedules for energy-intensive devices, like HVAC systems or appliances, to operate during off-peak hours or when energy demand is low. This feature aims to reduce costs and overall consumption.

features.title: High-Usage Area Identification
features.description: Highlight specific devices, rooms, or time periods with abnormally high energy usage to help users pinpoint areas for improvement. This will be visualized through reports or heatmaps in the user interface.

features.title: Energy Savings Progress Tracking
features.description: Allow users to track the impact of implemented recommendations and schedules by comparing current energy usage against historical data. This feature will display savings in terms of energy units, cost, or environmental impact.

epics.title: Automation and Control Integration
epics.description: Enable users to automate energy-saving actions by integrating the dashboard with smart home systems to control devices remotely. Features include setting schedules or rules for turning off unused devices.

features.title: Smart Home Device Integration
features.description: Allow users to connect the dashboard with various smart home systems to discover and manage compatible devices. This feature enables seamless communication between the dashboard and devices like smart thermostats, lights, and plugs.

features.title: Remote Device Control
features.description: Enable users to remotely turn devices on or off directly from the dashboard. This functionality provides real-time control over energy-consuming devices from any location.

features.title: Automated Scheduling
features.description: Provide users the ability to create and manage schedules for turning devices on or off at specific times. This helps optimize energy usage by ensuring devices operate only when needed.

features.title: Energy-Saving Rules Engine
features.description: Allow users to define custom rules or conditions for automating device actions, such as turning off lights when no motion is detected. This feature enhances energy efficiency through context-aware automation.

features.title: Real-Time Status Monitoring
features.description: Display the current status (on/off) of connected devices within the dashboard. This gives users immediate visibility into their device states and energy consumption.

epics.title: Reporting and Goal Setting
epics.description: Provide tools for users to set energy reduction goals and generate detailed reports on usage trends over time. This helps users track progress and stay motivated to lower their electricity consumption.

features.title: Goal Creation Tool
features.description: Allow users to set personalized energy reduction goals by specifying target consumption levels and timeframes. This feature will guide users through the process with customizable templates and suggestions based on past usage.

features.title: Progress Tracking Dashboard
features.description: Provide a visual dashboard that displays real-time progress towards energy reduction goals with metrics like percentage achieved and remaining targets. Users can view daily, weekly, or monthly updates to stay motivated.

features.title: Usage Trend Reports
features.description: Generate detailed reports on energy consumption trends over user-defined periods, including comparisons to previous timeframes. This feature will highlight patterns, spikes, and potential areas for improvement.

features.title: Goal Achievement Notifications
features.description: Send automated notifications or alerts to users when they reach milestones or achieve their energy reduction goals. This feature will also provide celebratory messages or badges to encourage continued engagement.

features.title: Custom Report Export
features.description: Enable users to export their energy usage and goal progress reports in multiple formats (PDF, CSV) for personal records or sharing. This feature will include options to customize report content and date ranges.
